game_description: A FREESTYLE-DANCE RHYTHM ALTERNATIVE CUSTOM SONGS officially supported - never break with an update GOOD FITNESS - activates whole body without repetitive movements GREAT MUSIC – 55 free and 20 DLC songs from The Offspring, Muse In the demo, you can play 7 songs on all difficulty levels and experiment with all the modifiers - unlimited! The full version of Synth Riders is available on the Oculus Store featuring: • 75 Songs - 55 free and 20 DLC, including Muse and The Offspring! • Official Custom Song Support • Cross-Platform Multiplayer • 360° Spin Mode in Every Song • Party mode - local multiplayer We hope you will enjoy the demo and join the Synth Riders community soon!
